short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web page outliner as a mind map

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MindTOC is a webpage outliner, that allows you to create editable toc of your fav articles.

## Features

- Create editable toc for webpages
- Generate a mind map based on toc (TBD)
